{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-10-13T20:42:19.000Z", "description": "

Job Title: Site Reliability Engineer

Duration: 4 Months contract to hire

Location: Remote

 

Candidates who were SRE backgrounds with CI/CD focus

  • Going with an SLA, SLI, SLO approach where they talk about reliability
  • 1 SRE to every 2-3 areas (1 in 25-30)


Skills:

  • Windows/Linux servers--on-prem legacy hardware/infrastructure/servers
  • Cloud--preferred (Azure ideally)
  • Network equipment (Cisco)
  • Knowing the difference between observability and monitoring
  • Observability: understand state of service/overall health of the system 
  • Monitoring: specific to this specific component of this server
  • Scripting helpful, but don\u2019t need a coder--they identify areas of improvement/do scripting for integrations into Splunk, but that's handled by higher level people on team
